생존자 살인마 둘다함

원래도 밸런스 딱히 좋은겜은 아니였지만 생존자로도 빡세게 게임진행되고 살인마로도 불합리한 부분없이 게임 진행이 됬었음

이번 패치 내놓고 다 박살나버렸지만

생존자한테만 이득가는 버그만 수두룩빽뺵하게 추가되고 살인마는 밸런스 조정한답시고 떡너프 쳐맥이고 그와중에 밥버러지 발상으로 호재토템같은거나 쳐만들고

후속 패치로 버그 잡고 다시 밸런스 건들기 전까진 현재로서 살인마하는건 '저는 마조히스트니 제발 저를 정신적으로 괴롭혀주세요' 라고 선언하는 것임

물론 생존자 픽하면 큐시간은 더 늘어날거고 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ 큐시간 평균 10분 가보자 ㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋㅋ

从去年刚出游戏开始玩了4个月吧，也算是元老了，一直很喜欢这个游戏，不过因为学业关系从11月开始远离PC直到今年6月。再次回归的感觉自然是兴奋的，能够和自己的老搭档老朋友再一次玩这个游戏，心情自然不必多说。
不过这次回归碰上了点问题也顺便在这儿提问一下希望可以得到中国玩家们的帮助。更新了游戏之后进入游戏总是加载中，并且等待后会提示网络未连接这样的提示框，然后我就试了试用加速器，勉强进了游戏画面，但匹配进比赛后就会一直裂空闪现，完全没法好好游戏，并且我身边的朋友也碰到了类似状况，非常困扰。

[h1] Хорроры? Не, не слышал.	[/h1]

[i] Крч, проиграв несколько часов в DbD, я решил написать ещё один недо-обзор... хыхыхы...	[/i]

Значит так. Dead by daylight - хоррор игра, в которой 4 (а то и меньше) человека должны противостоять одному маньяку (который иногда затупает и обижается на мой троллинг))). За несколько своих так сказать каток всё, что я смог сделать, так это упороться... Упороться за Деревенщину с бензопилой, упороться за выжившего, бегавшего вокруг самого маньяка или какого-нибудь предмета (пока за мной гонится маньяк XD)...

[h1] Ну короче	[/h1]

Я пока не заметил в игре багов (может я слеп, как не знаю кто).
И дальше я не придумал, что написать... хыхыыхых...

Dead by daylight игра в которой можно фанится, играть на скилл, бомбить, ругатся от того что ты не тащиш как за выживших так и за маньяков, это игра в которой можно найти друзей хороших друзей но это очень редко, так % 60 играков начинают тролить, унижать и тд. Так как они типо скиловые игроки а ты дно заморское и посути на это должно быть пофиг но порой это задевает до глубины души и ты задумаваешся не ужели я так плох не ужели я на столько нуб. Но я скажу что на это надо забить болт и не смотря на то что 60% ну может я приувиличел 50% игроков ♥♥♥♥♥♥♥♥о каторым лижбы по ржать нат тобой есть и нормальные который и пусть ни чего не напишут но и не будут тебя унижать я 1 адин из них я этим не горжусь но и не парюсь от этого все мы люди все мы индивидуальны и все мы играем как хотим..
Tek başınıza oynuycaksanız almayın en az 3 kişi zevki çıkıyor.

非常にやりごたえのある非対照型対戦ゲーム。
慣れないうちは「こんなん無理ゲーじゃねぇか！」と言いたくなるほどキラーが強いが、パーク（スキル）が揃ってくるとだんだんと勝てるようになってくる。

ある程度のPCスペックがないと、カクついてしまって作業が失敗しまくる。
またホストとの接続状況が悪化して落ちてしまうと経験値が手に入らないので、回線強度は必要。

An interesting game with an intense learning Curve. I dont really like how DLC owners have such higher advantage. is one thing I will say. But its certainly worth a try if you like Survival horror multiplayer games.
不是特别耐玩

This game has a lot of potential and could possibly be a lot of fun. There are a few games where I have had a lot fun, but the majority of the time I played it was against people with 100's if not 1000's of hours in game and covered with all the best perks compared to your noob loadout. 

If you love multiplayer 4 v 1 titles this really is a good one, but like most of these type you are going to have a painful learning curve catching up to people when multi is your only option. 

If ai was added to this game so people could make it the killer or survivors and learn the game, it would have gotten a huge thumbs up from me and retained everyone i started playing with. I know companies dont like adding ai for all the work, but it sure makes a difference in my play circle when it comes to buying games, so i hope to see that trend change.

Ich habe ja jetzt schon fast meine 1000 Stunden in dem spiel und dachte mir es wird Zeit mal eine Review zu schreiben.
Anfangs passt alles, das Setting, die Stimmung, der Spielspaß einfach alles. Mit der Zeit kamen neben den 3 Standartkillern und den 4 Standartsurvivorn immer mehr dazu was ich im ersten Moment nicht schlecht finde. Nur die meisten Killer die mit DLCs kamen animieren unerfahrene Spieler an den Haken zu campen. Es gab auch viele änderungen bezüglich des Gameplays und der Balance. Früher, also am Anfang des Spiels war es noch so das ein Überlebender den Killer die ganze Runde hinhalten konnte ohne einmal einen Schlag zu kassieren. jetzt ist es fast unmöglich den Killer mehr als 2 Generatoren hinzuhalten was ich persönlich auch besser finde. Dann muss man nämlich mehr aufpassen und als Team zusammen arbeiten. Ich spiele das Spiel heute noch und es macht auch Spaß würde mir nur etwas mehr Abwechslung wünschen wie z.b. das man mit 2 Killern gegen 8 Überlebende spielt oder ein anderes Spielziel als 5 Generatoren reparieren und raus aber naja^^ es macht trotzdem immer noch Spaß nur die ganzen camper nerven extremst.......

E' un gioco molto interessante per il suo genere, ben pensato a livello di trama e mondo di gioco, non che ci sia una grande storia dietro da seguire, ma ogni cosa ha il suo posto e il suo perché, diciamo che sono delle piccole chicche (inutili) ma piacevoli, completano un pò il gioco.

A livello di gameplay c'è poco da dire, il gioco come meccaniche è semplice di per se, poi ogni partita può cambiare in base al killer che hai contro, come ci entri in partita da survivor e dagli altri survivor (parlo da main di quest'ultimo ruolo).

Per i giocatori... Qua non so nemmeno io cosa dire, trovi quelli bravi, quelli fortunati, quelli ignoranti, quelli che degli altri proprio non si interessano; per i killer anche qua trovi quelli bravi, quelli pessimi, i camperoni, ecc... Avrete tempo e modo di bestemmiare, per un motivo o l'altro.

Il gioco non è esente da bug, ne ha parecchi, non sempre, ma li noterete.
Per quanto le partite singole durino al massimo 10, metti anche 15 minuti, riuscire a progredire nel gioco con competenze, oggetti, accessori e cosi via richiederà molto tempo, i puntil i farete ad ogni game ma sono relativamente pochi ed avrete una progressione del vostro personaggio abbastanza lenta, mettete questa cosa in conto se volete acquistare questo gioco.

Detto tutto questo, è un gioco che consiglio, è dinamico, frenetico, devi sempre stare con i sensi all'erta, la sensazione di essere una preda (parlo sempre da main survivor) c'è e fa il suo lavoro.

Cool concept, but new survivors will be stuck against camping killers ALWAYS devs really need to figure out a way to fix that. Ive seen killers literally hang a survivor and wait there till they die or kill themsevles.

Past level 20 less campers however the isssue now is the fact that killer perks are OP to Survivior perks if solo Q if survivor with friends will they are way OP to the the killer. Plus when season resest you will have perk level 3 killers against you as a survivor with not character perk 2 or 3 however you can have a new survivor with on perk against a maxxed out killer. Not so far balancing needs majoring fixing. Killers with lots of perks will reck you no matter what you do. And query time is FUCKING horrible/

This game is shit. The balance between the survivors and the killer is shit. Survivors even can ridicule the killer by take action like sitting, or pointing while they're escaping. 
I really want to know the rank of the development teams, and what they're thinking. Do you think the killer is the clown that should make 4 survivors happy, but can't kill them?
There's no limit to survivors ability. When they improve skills, they can teabag or run away from killer infinitely or ~~~~. The can do so much things. 
But the killers? Killers are stupid clowns except nurse.
Also, the survivor's perk is sooooo~ much useful than killer's. Imbalance.
Development teams made killer idiot, but they don't satisfy. They want killers to be more stupid. They patch the game to make survivors happy, but killers to be unlucky man. 
Please don't buy this game if you're going to take the role of the fucking stupid idiot clown. That's not good idea.
But if you want to be a survivor? Buy it now. Because you can vex the idiots at every games.

Gostei do jogo. Ele pode ser frustrante no inicio pois os outros jogadores podem já ter mais experiência mas rapidinho já aprendemos algumas técnicas. Ele te faz pensar, te faz entrar na mente do adversário para saber seu próximo movimento, como tirar vantagens, como usar seus itens a seu favor, etc. Apesar de ter jogadores infantis que saem da partida para não perder, que trapasseiam e que "camperam", são poucos que fazem isso. Valeu cada centavo.
Muito bom jogar esse game com os amigos! Recomendo!

Very survivor sided, way too many second/third/fourth/fifth chances for bully survivor mains and SWF groups. Game needs to make the killer scary again. Gens are too fast and keys are broken. The core gameplay mechanics break down and become ridiculously survivor sided in the high ranks due to player knowing how to exploit the game's design: survivors having it easy.
The developers don't have a clue what to do with this game.

这个游戏不推荐有三大理由！！！
第一条，这个游戏有裂空，真心不是一般的多，说屠夫网有问题的，看一下自己的网速再BB。（最烦圣人婊了）每次总有自以为是的人乱说！！难道这个游戏都不能学学人家（十三号星期五），对于网速过低的人直接踢出游戏吗？卡裂空的满蜘蛛加杀戮都追不上，你策划怎么想的？脑子让猪拱了？？？网速玩不起单机玩腾讯游戏去啊！（垃圾裂空！！）
第二条，这个游戏的匹配机制有大问题，你告诉我20段的屠夫能匹配到四个1段的人类???研发你过来，我拿板砖给你加个红buff。顺便送你一句（fucking you morth）
第三条，这个游戏现在不要买，夏日打折原价88买的，现在只要44。我擦我原价买的啊！！刚买就打折！！你他妈坑爹的吧？？？所以说我强烈推荐不要买，最起码要等打折的时候再买。有PS4的就去买PS4版的，PC端的是有外挂的，我就加入了外挂群。有想要的可以私聊，价格优惠。（这挂是有反作弊的，游戏系统是查不到的。）
